nalu shakthi kapurge diyaniya wana aya 2010 di thiragatha wu tin patti chithrapataye keti bhumikawak samanga siya rangana jiwithaya aarambha kala athara eya anugamanaya kale nawa yowun natyayak wana law ka da end (2011) chithrapataye palamu pradhana charithaya rangapameni.wanijamaya washayen sarthaka aadara natyayak wana aashik 2 (2013) hi gayakayeku lesa rangapama sandaha kapur pulul piliganimak laba gaththeya.ee sandaha aya hondama niliya sandaha wu film feyar sammanaya sandaha namayojana laba gaththaya.eelanga wasaredi aya wiliyam shekspiyarge khedawachaka hamlatge anuwarthanayak wana wishal bharadwajge wiwechanathmakawa piligath hayidar (2014) natyaye opiliyawa padanam karagath charithayak nirupanaya kalaya.kapur romantika thrasajanaka chithrapatayak wana eek wilan (2014), eebisidi 2 (2015) natum natyaya saha bagi (2016) yana kriyadama natyawala rangapaweya.[2]
